summary: THE WINDSHIELD WIPERS ON MY 1996 CHEVY BLAZER STOPPED UNEXPECTEDLY.  I CONTACTED TWO CHEVY DEALERS ABOUT THE PROBLEM.  EACH SAID THE PROBLEM WAS COMMON, BUT ONLY 1997 BLAZERS ARE UNDER RECALL.  MY 1996 BLAZER HAS THE SAME MECHANISM AS THE 1997 BLAZER.  I WROTE TO CHEVROLET AND WAS TOLD ONLY 1997'S WERE UNDER RECALL, WHICH I ALREADY KNEW.  I WOULD LIKE THIS DEFECTIVE EQUIPMENT REPLACED.  THIS CAN CAUSE AN ACCIDENT.*JB
